```{r dice}
check_double<-function(){
  if(face[1]==face[2]){
    movement=sum(face)
    dice()
    double_count=double_count+1
      if(double_count==3){
        player_df[player+1, 2] = 11
        return(assign("player_df",player_df,.GlobalEnv))
      }
    return(double_count)
  }else{
    movement=sum(face)
  }
}

jail_out<-function(){
  if(face[1]==face[2]){
    movement=sum(face)
  }else{
    jail_count=jail_count+1
    if(jail_count==3){
      movement=sum(face)
    }
    return(jail_count)
  }
}

dice <- function(){
  double_count = 0
  jail_count = 0
  face = sample(1:6,2,replace=TRUE)
  if(player_df[player+1, 2] = 11){
    while(jail_count<3){
    jail_out()
    break
    }
  }
  while(double_count<3){
    check_double()
  }
}
```
```{r Money}

money_board<-function(){
  if(player_df[player+1, 2] = 24 || player_df[player+1, 2] = 39){
    cc_money()
  }
  if(player_df[player+1, 2] = 19 || player_df[player+1, 2] = 34 ){
    chance_money()
  }
  if(player_df[player+1, 2] = 21){
    free_parking()
  }
}

cc_money<-function(){
  money_amount = money_amount + cc_cards[,2]
  if(cc_cards[,2]== negative){
    bank_money = bank_money - cc_cards[,2]
    return(bank_money)
  }
}

chance_money<-function(){
  money_amount = money_amount + chance_cards[,2]
  if(chance_cards[,2]== negative){
    bank_money = bank_money - chance_cards[,2]
  }
}

free_parking<-function(){
  if(parking_money==0){
    money_amout=money_amout+100
    return(money_amout)
  }
  parking_money = parking_money + bank_money
  money_amount = money_amount + parking_money
}
```
